ls.title: Homepage(beta)
ls.content:
Welcome,

To your very boring website template, to inform you of the power of super:. And how super: can help you build your custom website quickly and efficiently. Please access super: with (username: super, password: duper) to get started.
You may change the admin login as you wish, once you have successfully logged on. super: allows you to instantly install modules via. super:store.Here is a simple list of some modules you may want to add to your website right away:

1. People, gives your super: site the ability to have users. ($2.99)
2. Messages, allows contact between users on your site via. People module. ($2.99)
3. Contact, lets visitors contact you directly. View these messages in super:. ($2.99)
4. Shop, allow users in People module to shop on your site. ($2.99)
5. Pages, content management system, add pages to your site. (Free / Prepackaged)

Creating your own modules is super simple too. Just create a directory for your module in your site directory and have all links, functions, and forms pass through super:?mod={your_mod_dir}/{your_mod_page}. Then add create a menu.xml inside its directory so that super: will know which pages in the module directory to list on the your module menu on super:. Security of your custom modules are handled via. super: itself. Do not add your own security login scripts or it could make other modules vulnerable to false data submission, or data deletion. A module template is available in the System directory of your website.

Enjoy.
- Jose Viscasillas
